Title: Analysis of Soa Framework for Real Estate Industry
Affiliations: Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Scelen, Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Januar, L., Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Fajar, A.N., Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: This study focus to analysis business model for SOA framework implementation in property in real estate commerce. It cause of the improvement of revolution industry for support real estate industry. Although many of e-commerce has been support real estate industry, however there is a challenge to build SOA framework to improve it. Research method in this study is observe the phenomenon, literature review, and analysis business model with business canvas model. We proposed the business model and analysis system requirement of SOA framework to support real estate industry. We create recommendation to integrate the ecosystem in the real estate industry which is different and various platform and applications. It cause the integration is needed and to improve the seamless integration. © 2020 IOP Publishing Ltd. All rights reserved.
Author Keywords: analysis; business model; integration; Real estate industry; SOA
Index Keywords: Physics; Business modeling; Literature reviews; Real estate; Real estate industries; research methods; Seamless integration; Commerce
References: Pandey, P., Pattnaik, P.K., Kumar, R., Survey: SOA Architecture in Cloud Computing (2016) International Journal on Data Science and Technology, 2 (1), pp. 1-4; Basias, N., Themistocleous, M., Morabito, V., An Investigation of Benefits Affecting SOA Adoption in e-Banking (2014) International Journal of E-Education, E-Business, E-Management and E-Learning, 4 (3), pp. 174-179; Loya, S.R., Kawamoto, K., Kawamoto, K., Kawamoto, K., Service Oriented Architecture for Clinical Decision Support: A Systematic Review and Future Directions (2014) Journal of Medical Systems, pp. 1-22; Isabelle, M., (2016) The Service Oriented Architecture Handbook; Laudon Kenneth, C., Carol Gucio, T., (2014) E-commerce 2014 Business, Tecnology, Society 10th Edition; Malekzadeh, B., (2010) Event-Driven Architecture and SOA in Collaboration; Rompas, B.R., (2012) APLIKASI LOCATION-BASED SERVICE PENCARIAN TEMPAT di KOTA MANADO BERBASIS ANDROID; De Oliveira, S.B., (2012) Information and Service-Oriented Architecture & Web Services: Enabling Integration and Organizational Agility
